title: Entering & Exiting from the backdoor of the house #assimalhakeem #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: Saba says I heard it is prohibited to use the back door of the house for entry and exit I'm wondering if this is true and what's the ruling on it no this is not true this is totally baseless when a house has multiple entrances and it's your own house and you enter from or exit from any entrance you wish this is totally permissible and Halal without any problem
